name: Freeze the Way
description:
Challenge your memory in a unique and addictive way in this incredible puzzle adventure.

- "If you’re looking for a challenging time-killer that will stimulate your brain and hone your memory skills, then Freeze the Way could be a good option to consider." - App Advice

---------------------------------------

The magician Alex Snow is very forgetful, are you able to remember the path and help him cross the lava river safely?

Show that the volcano is no match for you, freeze the way and get as far as you can.

---------------------------------------

Face this epic adventure alone or compete with your friends. Prove that you are unbeatable when it comes to memory challenges.

Features Freeze the Way:
- Amazing graphics
- Many achievements to be unlocked
- Game Center integrated
- 4 unique modes of play
- Challenge your friends in social networks
- Daily awards in random mode
- Leaderboard for you and your friends
- Awesome powers to help you reach further
